text: Aires Rodrigo da Encarnação Sousa (born 17 September 1998) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for C.S. Marítimo B. ==Career== Born in Funchal, Sousa made his professional debut with Sporting da Covilhã in a 2017–18 LigaPro match against União da Madeira on 10 December 2017. ==References== ==External links== * * *Aires Sousa at ZeroZero Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Funchal Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:S.L. Benfica footballers Category:S.C. Covilhã players Category:C.F. Os Armacenenses players Category:LigaPro players Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players
title: Aires Sousa
